min_distance.description: Flanking is enabled if distance to target is more than this and less then max distance.

max_distance.description: Flanking is enabled if distance to target is less than this and more then min distance.

max_flank_angle.description: The maximum flank angle. If 0, the enemy would travel straight towards the target, 90 would be perpendicular and could orbit the target (if looked at).

feeler_length.description: The length of the flanking feelers. If a feeler is obstructed, the ai will be less likely to flank the closer to the obstacle that it is.
